def nth_perm(n, d):
    res = ''
    nums = [str(i) for i in range(d)]
    for i in range(d, 0, -1):
        idx, nums = divmod(n, math.factorial(i-1))
        res += nums[idx]
        nums.pop(idx)
        n = nums[0]
    return res

def nth_perm(n, d):
    res = ''
    nums = [str(i) for i in range(d)]
    for i in range(d, 0, -1):
        idx, nums = divmod(n, math.factorial(i-1))
        res += nums[idx]
        nums.pop(idx)
        n = nums[0]
    return res

def nth_perm(n,d):
    factors = [math.factorial(i) for i in range(1,d)]
    num = list(str(range(d)))
    result = ""
    n -= 1
    for i in range(d,0,-1):
        index = n // factors[i-1]
        n %= factors[i-1]
        result += str(num.pop(index))
    return result
